title: Need urgent help !
content:
Hey gang, I need the help of pros here.

Can anyone Id this font.

Many thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [test.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201162018/http:/typophile.com/files/test_8.jpg) | 46.29 KB |

 [‹ font name](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201162018/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49384 "Go to previous forum topic") [Type ID Maasstad Ziekenhuis ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201162018/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49341 "Go to next forum topic")
author: one_mack

comments.content: Where is the sample from? Packagingdesign? Then chances are high, that it is handmade. You could try [Hubert Jochams Packaging types](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201162018/http:/www.hubertjocham.de/index.php/type/packaging/) for similar ones.
might be [Mercurius Medium](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201162018/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/mercurius/), digitally slanted (as opposed to using Mercurius Medium Italic).

Many thank guy’s !  
real great help !
